Thursday, August 8

Friday, August 9

Optional Group Activity Options

Kayaking

We set up a 4 hour (2.5 hours on the water) kayak tour with SeaQuest Kayak Tours for our wedding guests (unfortunately we won‚Äôt be able to join since we‚Äôll be on a family whale watch) on Friday, August 9th from 10:30 am - 2:30 pm. It‚Äôs $147 a person (with taxes and 6% credit card fee) and you can sign up at this link. Make sure you mention you are on the custom tour with Ira‚Äôs wedding. Please note: the link says 10:30 - 1:30, but that‚Äôs just a system limitation on their end.

Other Activities

Welcome Party

6:00 pm | Garden at Saltwater Farm 176 Sea Breeze Ln, Friday Harbor, WA 98250

Join us for dinner, drinks, and mingles at Saltwater Farm. There will be a shuttle available from town to bring guests to and from Saltwater.

Dress: Casual PNW finest (flannels, jeans, and birkenstocks (with or without socks), encouraged!)

Saturday, August 10

On Saturday, August 10, we‚Äôre getting married! Join us for a full day of activities:

Morning Beach Walk or Run/Hike

9:00 am | American Camp South Beach Parking Lot

Meet at the American Camp South Beach Parking Lot for a walk along the beach overlooking the Haro Strait or a short trail run/hike (~3ish miles) through the historic American Camp before the festivities begin!

Wedding Festivities

3:45 pm | Saltwater Farm 176 Sea Breeze Ln, Friday Harbor, WA 98250

Join us for an evening of wedding celebrations. We‚Äôll have a ceremony on the picturesque ceremony lawn and then walk to the barn to celebrate in style. Please try to arrive by 3:45 pm. There will be a shuttle available from town to bring guests to and from Saltwater Farm.

Dress: The dress code is PNW party (cocktail or semi-formal is fine, and anything nicer than jeans preferred). Of note, the walk between the ceremony site and the reception is a bit over a quarter mile of gravel road. If you plan to wear heels, please consider a chunky heel or wedges.

Ceremony
4:00 pm | Ceremony Lawn

The ceremony will be outside on the ceremony lawn. Please bring a pair of shades and some sunscreen in case of sun!

Dinner and Dancing
5:00 pm - 11:00 pm | Barn

We‚Äôll kick things off with a cocktail hour, followed by family style dinner, and a night of dancing!

11:00 pm - later | JP‚Äôs

This isn‚Äôt just any after party, it‚Äôs Ira‚Äôs Big Bowling Birthday Bash! Ira has been joking about having a bowling birthday party for two years and we thought - what better time to hold it than directly after our wedding. We‚Äôll have a shuttle taking guests from Saltwater Farm to JP‚Äôs, which is right in Friday Harbor. The shuttle will also take folks home from JP‚Äôs as well. We bowled a few frames at JP‚Äôs in May and had a blast - there‚Äôs bowling, arcade games, pool, music, a gathering space, and a bar. We hope you‚Äôll join us!
